## Production Function

$$
Y = F(K, L) = \bar{A}K^{1/3}L^{2/3} 
$$ {#eq-productionmodel}

-   $\bar{A}$ - Productivity parameter.

-   $K$ - Capital

-   $r$ - Rental price of capital

-   $L$ - Labor

-   $w$ - Wage

Cobb-Douglass ([link](https://assets.aeaweb.org/asset-server/journals/aer/top20/18.1.139-165.pdf)): $Y = K^{a}L^{1-a}$
